#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    string s;
    cin>>s;
    long long int i;
    for(i=0;i<s.length();i++)
        s[i]+=3;
    cout<<s;
    return(0);
}
